SASKATCHEWAN ARCHIVES QUESTIONNAIRE

No. 3

PIONEER EXPERIENCES - A GENERAL QUESTIONNAIRE

NOTE: Please print all proper names and place names in capital letters. If you are not sure the name is correct as you have given it, please say so. It is quite acceptable to have someone else do the writing of your dictation.

1. Your full name: Mrs. Amanda Dunlop
2. Your address: 461 8th Ave.

10. How did you learn about the West? (Through other people? Reading about it? Railroad or government information?): Through friends
